title: 48.40 SUBJECT TO ORDERS OF COURT.
text: Every such bank shall be subject at all times to the orders of any court from which it shall have accepted any trust or appointment and shall render to the court such itemized and verified accounts and reports as may be required by law or the court. In addition to other reports required by law, it shall render to the commissioner, at such times as the commissioner may direct, full and itemized reports of investments, trust funds, and other business performed under the provisions hereof, and a condensed statement of the report, either separately stated or consolidated with the other reports required of it by law, shall be published as required by law.
